design_principles.democratic_governance: All major decisions made through democratic consensus
design_principles.systematic_approach: Methodical, repeatable processes for consistent quality
design_principles.scalable_coordination: Multi-agent coordination that grows with scope
design_principles.continuous_improvement: Iterative enhancement based on feedback and results
design_principles.quality_over_speed: Maintain high standards while scaling operations

agent_coordination.method: Agent Cellphone system with democratic oversight
agent_coordination.scalability: Unlimited agent support with intelligent routing

workflow_automation.scalability: Dynamic workflow generation based on repository type

communication_framework.method: Smart Discord integration with significance filtering
communication_framework.information_flow: Efficient routing based on importance and urgency
communication_framework.stakeholder_engagement: Targeted updates for different audience types

sustainability_mechanisms.resource_optimization: Dynamic allocation based on workload and priorities
sustainability_mechanisms.knowledge_preservation: Systematic documentation and best practice sharing
sustainability_mechanisms.capacity_building: Continuous agent training and skill development

phases.transformation_strategy: Phased approach with proven patterns and scaling

phase_1.learning_objectives: Identify best practices and optimization opportunities

phase_2.focus: Scale proven patterns and optimize processes

scaling_mechanisms.parallel_processing: Multiple agents working simultaneously on different repos
scaling_mechanisms.workload_distribution: Intelligent routing based on agent expertise and capacity
scaling_mechanisms.quality_automation: Automated checks and quality gates for consistency
scaling_mechanisms.continuous_improvement: Iterative enhancement based on democratic feedback

sustainability_indicators.execution_speed: 2-3 repos per week to beta-ready status

qa_framework.framework_type: Comprehensive Quality Assurance for Large-Scale Transformation

technical_quality.code_standards: Consistent coding practices and style guides
technical_quality.security: Security best practices and vulnerability assessment

community_strategy.strategy_type: Sustainable Community Building for Repository Transformation

ecosystem_growth.integration: Seamless integration with existing tools and platforms
ecosystem_growth.innovation: Encouragement of creative solutions and approaches

engagement_mechanisms.discord_community: Active Discord server for real-time collaboration
engagement_mechanisms.feedback_channels: Multiple ways for contributors to provide input

growth_metrics.contribution_volume: Growing amount of contributions and improvements
growth_metrics.community_activity: Higher levels of engagement and participation
